scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:html && npm run lint:md
scripts.a11y: start-server-and-test "npm run serve" http://127.0.0.1:4173 "pa11y --config pa11y.config.cjs http://127.0.0.1:4173"
scripts.lh: start-server-and-test "npm run serve" http://127.0.0.1:4173 "CHROME_PATH=$(node -e 'const { chromium } = require("playwright"); process.stdout.write(chromium.executablePath())') lighthouse http://127.0.0.1:4173 --quiet --chrome-flags='--headless --no-sandbox' --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-report.html"
scripts.qa: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run a11y && npm run lh && npm run e2e
